name: There Will Be Dawn
description:
This game was made as a part of my university honours project, so I would be very appreciative if you filled out this survey after you have completed your playthrough.

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScqeCvwopM-EHvolWTdbSCelbcfXFppTuqsLwCkrmPixIy_Fw/viewform?usp=sf_link

It's late at night. The monsters are stirring. In preparation, you have assembled a mighty fortress of blankets and pillows to protect you from the monsters. Besides hiding in the blanket fort, you have the contents of your toybox to protect you. From the tenacious teddy bear, ready to cuddle any nightmares away to the plastic platoon, all willing to lay down their tiny lives to protect you. Survive wave after wave of Nightmares as your bedroom, once so familiar to you, becomes something terrifying and alien.

This game is also currently being treated as a demo, with plans to release a more polished version with custom art assets and extended gameplay. All of the character images and a number of the background artwork was either purchased from asset stores,  while the rest of the art in the initial room and a great deal of the following concept art was created by: https://www.facebook.com/ReNouveauArt
